Text: I had to leave my girlfriend for 4 weeks because of my studies. á This happens frequently. The last 24 hours before my departure á are always very depressing.
Label: sadness

Text: When I was in the army, a room mate of mine came back from á furlough and threatened another fellow with a knife.
Label: fear

Text: My mother told my uncle who is a Roman Catholic Priest á (Redemptist Father) that I had been living in a de-facto á relationship for three years. He was very, very angry at me.
Label: shame

Text: My friend told me he really likes me.
Label: joy

Text: When people are eating unsavoury (smacking, belching, speaking á with food in their mouth, etc.).
Label: disgust

Text: When I finished a love affair where I was responsible of the sad á end.
Label: guilt

Text: Found out that me and my best friend are both chosen for the á English lectures.
Label: joy

Text: A friend of mine told other people that I was a slattern (because á of an occurence that had happened some time ago). When I heard á about that I was very angry.
Label: anger

Text: Failing an examination.
Label: sadness

Text: My mother and I had an argument over buying some clothes for me.  á She did not accept the fact that I did not like the same things á as her, and we ended up shouting at each other.
Label: anger

Text: As a child when I was blamed for peeing in the swimming-pool.
Label: shame

Text: When my friends and I were caught with our girlfriends outside á the school grounds when I was at the secondary school.  We were á caught by the headmaster.
Label: guilt

Text: A few months back I had gone to my friend's place and they offered á me tea and coffee.  I do not have the habit of drinking tea or á coffee and so they offered me a glass of milk instead, so I felt ashamed.
Label: shame

Text: It was my father's birthday party when I was asked to bring a á tray of tea and other drinks.
Label: shame

Text: When they gave away my dog to other people without my knowledge.
Label: sadness

Text: This happened when I went to visit my friend in Chelston and á found him screwing my girlfriend.
Label: disgust

Text: A girl with whom I was staying having sex with a person for about á 3 nights running, and then with his brother the following night, á and back again.
Label: disgust

Text: A close friend took part in a racist violent action.
Label: disgust

Text: I had misbehaved at a party and did not wish to meet the person á in question later.
Label: shame

Text: Tripped on a busy street.
Label: anger

Text: When I answered to my mother with rudeness.
Label: guilt

Text: I was in grade 7.  We had an inter-house volley-ball competition. á  In Luapula I was the youngest member of the team and I scored  á the winning goal using my head.  I jumped up with joy and fell á down.
Label: joy

Text: I was walking on a street alone in the afternoon when there were á not too many people on the street.  A couple of guys were á following me and I was ignoring them.  Suddenly one of them came á in front of me and started using dirty language and harrassing á me.  I got very angry and wanted to strike back at them.
Label: anger

Text: Equivocal situation when filling a security questionnaire on á entering a government building with several people there.
Label: shame

Text: Insulted by teacher.
Label: anger

Text: I was at school and afterwards went to work. After work I went to á see a friend and stayed out late. when I got home my mother was á awake and I felt guilty.
Label: guilt

Text: I went to the shopping centre to buy something and saw packets of á Kapenta  with maggots in them. Oh !
Label: disgust

Text: I felt sadness when my grandfather died.
Label: sadness

Text: When my co-resident opened the bathroom door while I was bathing á inside.
Label: shame

Text: I experience that feeling when I am unsulted without deserving á it or when someone deceives me.
Label: anger

Text: One of the greatest sadness was when my grandfather died, because á I loved him very much.
Label: sadness

Text: I travelled on a bus and I forgot to punch the ticket. A ticket á collector came in and I had to pay the fine. I did it with a feeling á of shame.
Label: shame

Text: I was looking at a one-man show on television. He told very á disgusting things so that I started to be disgusted with it. á (Later on it proved that this was his intention).
Label: disgust

Text: It was the time I went home for my holidays only to find that my á sister had passed away.  The news had been hidden from me, so á that I could take my exams.
Label: sadness

Text: I felt the emotion when I fought somebody who was drunk and tried á to disturb us while we were having meals.
Label: guilt

Text: Staying in a relative's house which was broken in before.
Label: fear

Text: A close friend of mine had not contacted me for a long time.
Label: sadness

Text: I felt disgusted on seeing my boyfriend after our separation.  á One day he was begging at the mass transit railway station and at á that moment I hated him.
Label: disgust

Text: When I got to know that the friend I am closest to got engaged, á and she was going away.  I was overjoyed for her, but also felt á frightened as I was very emotionally dependent on her.  I did not á know what I would do without her.
Label: fear

Text: Mentioning a book to the person who borrowed it.
Label: guilt

Text: When my friends tried to discriminate against my friendship with á certain other friends which they thought was improper.
Label: anger

Text: Was accused of having hidden intentions in a situation when I á believed I was acting honestly and fairly.
Label: shame

Text: When I realized that I was in hospital after a car accident and á that I had a scleral tear in my left eye.
Label: sadness

Text: Yelled at my parents for not buying me a car like other parents.
Label: guilt

Text: When I was betrayed by a friend, and decided to stay apart form á her.
Label: sadness

Text: My grandfather's death.
Label: sadness

Text: We lived with 3 persons in the loft of a house. It often occurred á that other persons again and again climbed the stairs with much á noise. When I was studying I couldn't concentrate and got angry.
Label: anger

Text: When my grandfather died.
Label: sadness

Text: Some days ago I had a car accident. It was quite slight but á through my fault. I felt strong shame because I had the spirits á of a good driver.
Label: shame

Text: I had a date with a friend to see a movie and my friend was late. á  I waited for a long hour and was very angry.
Label: anger

Text: When, after a long time, I saw a girl with whom I was in love.
Label: joy

Text: When I came again in contact with a girl I liked very much. And á most important she also liked me.
Label: joy

Text: I was sitting in a station-hall and watching a lavatory á attendant. She was very dirty. She started to eat something out á of a dirty cup - it must have been something like lard. Then she á took some breadcrumbs out of the pockets of her apron and ate á them. I had to leave - I felt like vomitting.
Label: disgust

Text: I separated with the one I liked most.  She refused all my dates á and told me that she had dated another one.  My heart seemed to á cease beating.  I was silent for some time and then I whispered á goodbye and left without turning back.
Label: sadness

Text: Class leader told me to collect homework for him.
Label: disgust

Text: I am not good enough for your experiment I am doing.
Label: guilt

Text: When I failed some tests my first year at CAL.
Label: shame

Text: I was scared in the dark when I was a little boy.
Label: fear

Text: During labour when the foetal sounds became faint and there was a á big alert for a forceps delivery.
Label: fear

Text: When we forced a friend to chew a poisonous herb in primary á school.  His tongue was swollen and he told his mother about it.  á The mother reported it to the headmaster who threatened to expel á us.
Label: fear

Text: The birth of my first child.
Label: joy

Text: When I was a Sr. in HS. one of the class counselors died of á hepatitis. She was very sensitive. She knew my shyness and drew á me out to improve myself image. I missed her funeral - so I could á not publically grieve. My parents didn't understand.
Label: sadness

Text: When I learned that several people had died in the street due to  á the cold weather.
Label: anger

Text: You ignored the fact that we could not hear you at the back.
Label: sadness

Text: When a close relative of mine passed away, it was the first time á that someone so close to me had died.
Label: sadness

Text: Failing in the English language exam.
Label: shame

Text: At an unworthy behaviour of a man, pettiness, stupidity and á mostly at a philistinism.
Label: disgust

Text: When I behaved improperly - fought in a public place.  á Afterwards, I felt guilty about my conduct.
Label: guilt

Text: I had drunk a couple of beers and my fiancee got angry at me.
Label: sadness

Text: The time I learnt that I had passed my Malawi School leaving á Certificate Examinations.
Label: joy

Text: As a child (i.e. 5-7) hiking in reasonably rugged bush and á becoming lost for a duration of 5-7 hours.
Label: fear

Text: When my middle child became very difficult to handle after the á birth of his baby brother and I did not have any patience with á him.
Label: guilt

Text: After passing my Malawi Certificate of Education Exam and being á selected to Kamuzu College of Nursing.
Label: joy

Text: Someone who was speeding was forced to slow down when I pulled á out onto the road and proceeded to abuse me at the next set of á traffic lights.
Label: anger

Text: Going out with another girl besides my girlfriend and not telling á her.
Label: guilt

Text: It was last week on Saturday night when I was at Mchesi. I feared á to cross the Lilongwe River Bridge to come back to School due to á darkness - until somebody had to escort me.
Label: fear

Text: When I had to leave my mother and my sister after a week's visit.
Label: sadness

Text: While watching the movie called \Deer hunter\" on TV, when it á
Label: disgust

Text: I felt fear when I was young and left in my big house all alone.
Label: fear

Text: I felt disgusted when I was not given money for lunch at school á by my father as a punishment for beating my little brother.
Label: disgust

Text: When I realized that the person I was courting hadn't been really á by my side for a long time already. He had deceived me and I let á him deceive me.
Label: anger

Text: My P.T. instructor also works as a masseur. He wanted to massage á me, therefore I had to undress. For the first few times this was á not easy for me; I got gradually used to it.
Label: shame

Text: The cat of my landlady escaped through the window which I had á left open.
Label: guilt

Text: I found a big, black spider near a bag of food.
Label: disgust

Text: I was angry with a friend of mine who behaved in an affected á manner.
Label: anger

Text: [ The same as in shame.]
Label: guilt

Text: The day I was nearly stabbed to death by ruffians who wanted to á take my money.  I refused to give them any money and they started á running after me, I ran into somebody else's house to save á myself.
Label: fear

Text: A person with whom I had been on bad terms, gave me a present. We á became reconciled.
Label: joy

Text: Somebody wanted to beat my brother at a wedding ceremony and I á was trying to protect my brother but the other man was calling á names to both of us.
Label: anger

Text: I stayed at the Coast for a weekend with friends. My brother came á to drive me home, but was rude, and in a hurry to rejoin his á friends. I was embarrassed because the family involved was á extremely nice, and hospitable to him.
Label: disgust

Text: I had a quarrel with near persons. I said many ill-considered á things and I regretted it when it was to late.
Label: guilt

Text: We were walking in the park at night.  It was very dark and very á late.  We began to hear foot steps all around us, and we could á not find our way out.
Label: fear

Text: I had not punched a ticket in the bus because I had a card. But á when the ticket-collector came it turned out that I had forgotten á it. The shame I felt was great though it was not done on purpose.
Label: shame

Text: I felt anger against a person who told bad things about me in my á absence.
Label: anger

Text: When I learnt of the death of a friend.
Label: sadness

Text: At the dentist's, waiting for my turn to come.
Label: fear

Text: When the lady who is now my wife accepted my proposal to be my á lover and future wife.
Label: joy

Text: After I had been away for a long time a friend told me that I had á passed all my written examinations.
Label: joy

Text: When I was selected for higher education, i.e grade 7 to formI.
Label: joy

Text: When my older sister told us that she was thinking of joining the á rest of the family for the winter sports holiday.
Label: joy

Text: Love problems.
Label: sadness

Text: My cousin and I were at the farm and at night we drunk like fools á and made a lot of noise.  We had drunk two much of wine.
Label: shame

Text: At the hardware store, trying to convert Imperial to Metric á measurements, I made a mistake, and didn't buy enough tiles for á the bathroom. I was angry at myself, because I hope to be a Maths á teacher.
Label: anger

Text: I felt disgust of my father when I knew he had a lover.
Label: disgust

Text: I went home and visited with my family and friends.
Label: joy

Text: Punished by a leader.
Label: anger

Text: My got my mathematics test's marks and could not believe that it á was true.  In the past I would have at least 80% marks.  Was I á getting weaker at studies ?  This made me feel that I should not á expect too much from going to the university.
Label: sadness

Text: Being told that I am a stupid person.
Label: anger

Text: When I was accused by my brother of having stolen a 5 kwatcha á note from my mother's bag.  I was beaten up for this, the money á was found later.
Label: anger

Text: I was very ashamed when I was neglected by a certain friend whom á I was thinking loved me very much.
Label: shame

Text: I attended a ceremony in Denmark which is comparable to our á Halloween. They build a large bonfire and place a life size dummy á of a witch. The crowd cheered when the dummy burst into flames.
Label: disgust

Text: When my family and I heard of the death of my grandfather.  We had á  seen him a few weeks earlier and it seemed that he had just been á waiting to see us.
Label: sadness

Text: One day I went to town to get my grocery.  On my way back, I took á a mini bus which was full of drunk students.  I felt very á disgusted.
Label: disgust

Text: When I passed the B.A exams with first class results.
Label: joy

Text: This is an event I will never forget.  I am considered a good á mimic.  This particular day we were waiting for a professor á to take her class.  This  professor had a peculiar accent and a á very horrible way of lecturing and to top it all we had this á class at the fag end of the day.  So this particular day I got á into my element and started imitating the professor, and the á professor entered the class right in the middle of it .  I was á unaware of her presence, some of my friends tried to warn me but á it was of no avail as I was too engrossed in mimicing.  Then I á suddenly noticed the silence and turned around to see her á entering the class.  I do not know till today if she actually saw á what I had been doing or she had completely ignored it.  Through  á out that lecture I died of shame.  All the more shameful was the á fact that she gave me a character certificate.
Label: shame

Text: I wrote a letter to my father to ventilate my bottled up á feelings. Afterwards I thought it was too negative.
Label: shame

Text: I asked a girl out on a date and she said no.
Label: sadness

Text: When summer is over and I have to leave the town where I spend my á holidays.
Label: sadness

Text: Told by some people the class leader only choose his friends (not á true).
Label: anger

Text: When my ex-husband left our house, and the children cried because á he was not coming back.
Label: guilt

Text: When I can see my parents because now I am far from them.
Label: joy

Text: Today I did a lot better on my architecture project than I á expected.
Label: joy

Text: After I had cheated my parents that I had lost my textbooks so á they had to send me money.
Label: guilt

Text: The time I knocked a deer down - the sight of the animal's á injuries and helplessness.  The realization that the animal was á so badly hurt that it had to be put down, and when the animal á screamed at the moment of death.
Label: disgust

Text: When I opted for my research field, for them the percentage of á marks was more important than my knowledge.
Label: disgust

Text: The week before I entered to army, when we were being selected. á During 5 days I had to pass 10 hours a day waiting for the á answer, which at last was the worst. The fear of being convoked, á of hearing the fated phrase, was constant.
Label: fear

Text: Finding out from this lecture that China is backward in á psychology.
Label: shame

Text: As part of the assessment I had to speak on a subject in front á of the class. I was not really prepared and I was just reading á the stuff I had on a piece of paper, when some of the students  á asked me something I could not give them an answer.  I felt á ashamed as I had not prepared the topic.
Label: shame

Text: The emotion came when a certain boy opened my locker without my á knowledge.
Label: anger

Text: Felt sad about some street kids in QUEII square, Aotea square. á Because they had been sniffing glue and some were very young. I á went into the role of a performing clown.
Label: sadness

Text: I was walking alone along the place where people fear that there á are always thieves there and the people who kill their friends á during the night two months ago.
Label: fear

Text: I do not recall being scared in the near past.
Label: fear

Text: During our last exarcise in agricultural machines we went out in á the yard to examine a row of machines. But we seemed not to have á fulfilled our task well, because when our teacher came and asked á me a question I was unable to answer. I felt awkward because he á didn't deserve it.
Label: shame

Text: During the Xmas holiday, I and my best friend at Secondary School á had planned to meet at a Cultural afternoon at the Mt. Soche á Hotel after missing each other for such a long time. When I asked á my mother for permission, she told me not to go for no good á reason. I felt very angry with her.
Label: anger

Text: I was filled with joy when I heard that I had been selected to á come here at Kamuzu College of Nursing.
Label: joy

Text: The acts of brutal violence in generally disgusts me. Fights, á phisical aggrssion, etc.
Label: disgust

Text: When I was attacked by a teenage boy and had my wallet stolen.
Label: fear

Text: When my gradmother died.
Label: sadness

Text: Meeting generally dominating persons in social occasions.
Label: anger

Text: The negative feelings towards me displayed by my á \parents-in-law\"."
Label: guilt

Text: When I was accused of neglecting work for the wrong reasons.
Label: sadness

Text: When at very short notice I agreed to work in place of a friend á who was sick, and owner of the restaurant refused to allow me a á drink later in the evening (which is usually always available for á workers), did not thank me, and was generally indifferent towards á me - I felt I did not deserve this.
Label: anger

Text: After having watched a crime show on the TV, I was about to take á the dog for a walk. Then, suddenly, there was a man on the á porch... (We live some distance away from other people).
Label: fear

Text: My father had a heart attack when I was not at home (I was still á living with them).  He recovered relatively well although he had á to retire (which implied relief from the stress of a small scale á enterprise).
Label: sadness

Text: Getting into a crowded bus.
Label: disgust

Text: Getting ill.
Label: fear

Text: My daughter was 2 yrs she went up to a colt tried to hit it. It á turned on her and kicked her over the heart, sent her flying á through the air. I left my mother and sister to deal to her as á they are nurses. I felt I didn't want to know if she was going to á die, it was just too much.
Label: fear

Text: One night, after having decided to finish our relationship, I á took my girlfriend home.  While driving back home, I felt that I á had not handled the whole thing very well.
Label: guilt

Text: One day in the TYBA class the teacher asked me a very simple á question which I could not answer.  Finally the teacher himself á gave us the answer and my friends started laughing at me as I had á not been able to answer a simple question.  I knew the answer but á feared that my response may be wrong.  All this made me feel á ashamed of myself.
Label: shame

Text: Achieving my goal at a swim meet. I worked toward the goal for 9 á yrs. I was capable of achieving it, but I didn't know when.
Label: joy

Text: Once my friend and I got into into a hot discussion on a very á controversial topic.  At one point of the argument I disagreed á with her totally and I took what she was saying as an insult.  So á I couter-argued and unknowingly hurt her emotionally, I felt very á sad about this.
Label: sadness

Text: I went shopping with my parents - my father payed everything for á me, I was very glad.
Label: joy

Text: As the time to get the results drew near I became more and more á anxious.  My friend called me and said, \ You have passed.\"  My á
Label: joy

Text: Many years ago I saw the film \Psycho\" by Hitchcock for the first á
Label: fear

Text: My sister was in a hospital, later in the evening we received the á information that she had died.
Label: sadness

Text: When I was complimented and called \delightful\"."
Label: joy

Text: When I got low marks in B.Sc final.
Label: anger

Text: As for disgust.
Label: anger

Text: I and my cousin went to a filmshow at night. We went without á making it known to my mother. While we were there at interval, I á came across my mother just close to where we sat.
Label: fear

Text: Stealing money from a milk token jar from a close friend of the á family when visiting.
Label: guilt

Text: I felt ashamed when I had not attended a class and the teacher asked á me the reason for my absence.
Label: shame

Text: Disagreements with mother.  When I moved from KankaanpSS, she had á promised to help me move but broke her promise because of some á hindrance.
Label: anger

Text: When my grandfather died.
Label: sadness

Text: I had not written to, or called my grandmother, who was lonely, á for a long time.  My mother asked me to call her on her behalf á and when I did so, my grandmother was delighted and she told me á that she had been waiting for some news from us.
Label: guilt

Text: Every time I went home with my school report.
Label: fear

Text: Being bored in school, not being able to marry and have children.
Label: sadness

Text: When I passed the first year and so I could come back for my á second year.
Label: joy

Text: It was in a group situation: suddenly it was my turn to say something,  but I felt that I was not able to express myself very well - I felt á ashamed and blushed.
Label: shame

Text: Obscene phone call where the person knew my name.
Label: fear

Text: I was seven years old and swimming outside the flags at the Gold á Coast. I was caught in a rip and taken out about 100 m. I á couldn't swim too well, but an older friend (17) swam out and á saved me.
